title: Disable GPU ownership of dGPU?
body:
Is it possible to provide a way to avoid using dGPU for Teams?

By some reason, by opening MS Teams, my dGPU card is being in use. It has the same behavior if I use DRI_PRIME=0 at Flatpak Env.

Not sure if a bug or a feature, so adding this as a Feature Request

dGPU normally: D3cold state
![Screenshot_20240913_134029](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3ec8f3c9-89e2-4b86-8479-24dddbd4d7ce)

dGPU when I open MS Teams: D0 state
![Screenshot_20240913_134118](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3e5ab750-277f-43da-b832-2872e6ef65c3)

I'm assuming this is something from ElectronJS, but if wants to use GPU acceleration, then it should use only the default GPU instead. Right now it's using both. iGPU and dGPU.

Current version: 1.10.2
Node: 20.15.1
v8: 12.4.254.20-electron.0
electron: 30.4.0
chrome: 124.0.6367.243
